sentence.Network_en: The earth, sun, and moon are spheres.
sentence.Network_cn: 地球, 太阳和月亮都是天体.
我们在不同的领域里活动.

entry.def: A sphere is an object that is completely round in shape like a ball.
A sphere of activity or interest is a particular area of activity or interest.

example.ex: ...nurses, working in all spheres of the health service.
example.tran: 在公共医疗保健服务业的各领域工作的护士们

entry.tran: (社会地位或兴趣等相同的)人群，阶层，圈子
entry.def: A sphere of people is a group of them who are similar in social status or who have the same interests.

example.ex: ...the realities of life outside the government and academic spheres of society.
example.tran: 政府和学术界以外社会阶层的生活现状

entry.tran: (国家的)势力范围，影响所及的范围
entry.def: A country's sphere of influence is an area of the world where it has a lot of influence.

example.ex: They see the region as their natural sphere of influence due to their historical links and a shared language.
example.tran: 基于历史上的联系和共同的语言，他们把该地区看成是自己天然的势力范围。

example.ex: ...countries traditionally within the British or American spheres of influence.
example.tran: 传统上处于英国或美国势力范围内的国家
